(2) 
In matrix notation that is AV = VI:. or V - I,4,V = E. or V lAV = 1:. The diagonal 
matrix E is like A (capital sigma versus capital lambda). E conlains the singular 
m/lles 01. 02. which are different from the eigenvalues At. Al in A.
